Furniture_Vnp_Chamomile_description
An action figure modeled on Chamomile, a bipedal vehicle (or Trotmobile) operated by Vanilla Bean, the hero of Steambot Chronicles.[#Legal]
Une figurine inspirée de Chamomile, un véhicule bipède (ou Trotmobile) conduit par Vanilla Bean, le héros de Steambot Chronicles.[#Legal]
Eine Action-Figur, welche Chamomile, einem bipedalen Fahrzeug (oder Tretmobil) aus Steambot Chronicles, welches von Vanilla Bean gesteuert benutzt wird, entworfen wurde.[#Legal]
Action figure che raffigura Camomilla, un veicolo bipede (detto anche Trotmobile) guidata da Vanilla Bean, il protagonista di Steambot Chronicles.[#Legal]
Un muñeco en miniatura que representa a Chamomile, el vehículo a pedales (o Trotmobile) que maneja Vanilla Bean, el héroe de Steambot Chronicles.[#Legal]
バンピートロットに登場する二足歩行型の乗り物、トロットビークルのフィギュア。主人公・バニラビーンズが搭乗する機体。[#Legal]
범피트롯에 등장하는 2족보행형 이동 수단, 트롯 비클 피규어. 주인공 바닐라 빈즈가 탑승하는 기체. [#Legal]
Figurine of a Trotmobile, the bipedal vehicle from BUMPY TROT. Piloted by the main character, Vanillabeans.[#Legal]
出現在BUMPY TROT裡的雙腳步行式的機器車Trotmobile的模型。主角Vanillabeans所搭乘的機型。[#Legal]
出現在BUMPY TROT裡的雙腳步行式的機器車Trotmobile的模型。主角Vanillabeans所搭乘的機型。[#Legal]
An action figure modeled on Chamomile, a bipedal vehicle (or Trotmobile) operated by Vanilla Bean, the hero of Steambot Chronicles.[#Legal]
